rule: The output must contain a section labeled "Company names" followed by a colon and a comma-separated list of company names extracted from the given text.
input: The collaboration between Google and Facebook was documented in the latest tech news.
output:
Company names: Google, Facebook  
People names: -||-  
Specific topics: collaboration, tech news  
General themes: technology, partnership, business relations
evaluation:
The chatbot output follows the desired format specified in the description. It includes the categories: "Company names," "People names," "Specific topics," and "General themes." Within each category, the output uses a comma-separated list format where applicable and adheres to the "-||-" notation for the "People names" section, which indicates no entries. There is no violation of the format requirements.

No violation. 
OK
